column2: "Nna Nun ne babanyin Josua somaa mbanyin beenu nsumaa mu fi Sittim dɛ aserafo dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɔhwɛ asaase no
column3: nye Jeriko. Na wɔkɔree
column4: na wɔkɔr ɔbaa huhunyi bi a ne dzin dze Rahab ne fie

column3: dɛ
column5: mbanyin bi fi Israelmba mu baa ha anadwe yi dɛ wɔrebɛsera asaase yi."

column2: "Na Jerikohen no somae ma wɔkɔr Rahab hɔ
column3: dɛ
column4: Fa mbanyin no a wɔaba abɛhɛn wo fie no pue: na wɔaba rebɛsera asaase no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no faa mbanyin beenu no
column3: na ɔdze hɔn sumae; na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "na ɔbaa dɛ aber a wɔdze tow kuropon no mu no durii no
column3: nna mbanyin no fii me nkyɛn: na mbrɛ wɔkɔree no dze
column4: minnyim: hom ntsiw hɔn ntsɛm; na hom bɔto hɔn."

column2: "Nna ɔnoara dze hɔn akɔ ɔdan etsifi na ɔdze hɔn ekosuma asaaba a wɔmmpaae bi a ɔaboaboa no yie wɔ ɔdan etsifi no mu."
"Na ɔhen no n’asomafo no faa Jordan kwan do tsiiw hɔn araa dze kodur esutwaree: na hɔn a wotsiiw hɔn no kɔree no ara
column3: na wɔtoow kuropon no mu."
Rahab fowee kɔr hɔn nkyɛn wɔ dan no etsifi hɔ:"
Minyim dɛ EWURADZE dze asaase yi ama hom
column4: na hom ho hu atɔ hɛn do
column5: na asaase yi do atsefo nyinara hɔn ho mbowa eguan wɔ hom ntsi."

column2: "Na yɛatse mbrɛ EWURADZE sii maa Mbɛw Po (Mbɛw Po) no no nsu wewee wɔ hom enyim
column3: aber a hom fi Egypt firii no; na dza hom dze yɛɛ Amorifo ahemfo beenu
column4: Sihon nye Ɔge a wɔwɔ Jordan egya no
column5: na mbrɛ hom sii sɛɛ hɔn pasapasa no nyinara."

column2: "Na yɛtsee no ara na hɛn akoma tui
column3: nkyii so ahom biara annka nyimpa biara mu bio
column4: osian hom ntsi: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn no

column3: mepa hom kyɛw
column4: hom mfa EWURADZE ndzi nsew nkyerɛ me dɛ
column5: ɔnam dɛ mayɛ hom yie ntsi
column6: hom so bɛyɛ m’egya fie yie

column3: nye me na
column4: nye mo nuanom mbanyin nye mbaa
column5: na adze a wɔwɔ nyinara nkwa
column6: na woeyi hɛn efi owu mu."

column3: Hɛn nkwa nhyɛ homdze ananmu
column4: sɛ hom annka hɛn nsɛm yi annkyerɛ a; ɔno ɔbɛba dɛ
column5: sɛ EWURADZE dze asaase yi ma hɛn a
column6: yɛnye wo bedzi no yie nye nokwar mu."

column2: "Nna ɔdze ntampee duaa tokura mu gogoow hɔn sisii famu: osiandɛ ne dan no si kurow no ho fasu no do
column3: na fasu no do na ɔtse."
Hom nkɔ bepɔw no do
column4: amma etsiwfo no aannto hom; na hom nsuma homho wɔ hɔ
column6: nkodu dɛ etsiwfo no bɛsan: na n’ekyir no hom bɔkɔ hom kwan a

column3: Yennkedzi so wɔ wo ntam a ama yɛaka yi ho."
sɛ yɛreba asaase yi do a
column4: fa serdaa ahoma yi kyekyer tokura a edze hɛn duaa mu sisii famu no mu: na boa w’egya
column7: nye w’egya ne fifo nyinara ano wɔ wo nkyɛn wɔ fie no mu."

column3: obiara a obefi wo fi mbobow ano akɔ abɔntsen do no
column5: na yennkedzi so: na obiara a ɔwɔ wo nkyɛn wɔ fie no
column6: sɛ obi dze ne nsa ka no a

column2: "Na sɛ eka hɛn asɛm yi kyerɛ a
column3: ɔnodze
column4: yennkedzi so wɔ wo ntam a ama yɛaka yi ho."

column3: Dɛ mbrɛ hom nsɛm yi tse no ara
column4: wɔmma ɔnyɛ hɔ. Na ogyaa hɔn kwan
column5: na wosii mu kɔree: na ɔdze serdaa ahoma no kyekyeer tokura no mu."

column3: na wɔtsenaa hɔ ndaansa
column4: kodur dɛ etsiwfo no sanee: na etsiwfo no hwehwɛɛ hɔn wɔ kwan no mu nyina

column3: na wofii bepɔw no do sianee
Ampaara
column4: EWURADZE dze asaase no nyinara ahyɛ hɛn nsa; na nkyii so asaase no do atsefo no nyinara hɔn akoma etu kɛsenara wɔ hɛn enyim."
